changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout d'un message online et offline lor: Added an online and offline message when starting and stopping (wanted or not) the daemon in topic_racine/state
changelog.md.monitor depuis le plugin virtuel le plug: monitor from the virtual plugin the plugin will automatically add the state command (online or offline), if you already have this equipment you must restart the discovery
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la transmission: Fixed a bug on the transmission of the real type of equipment (when transmitting equipment between jeedom
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la duplication d: Fixed bug on duplication of event listening task
changelog.md.Sur les équipements exportés si le plugi: On exported equipment if the source plugin exists on the target jeedom then jeedom will display the plugin icon
changelog.md.Pas d'erreur dans les logs lors de la tr: No error in the logs when transmitting the command (avoids breaking jeedom if the daemon is cut off
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'envoi des équi: Fixed a bug when sending equipment from the configuration window
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour voir les logs de: Added a button to see mosquitto logs (if it is in local broker mode)
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la documentation pour mie: Updated the documentation to better explain how to synchronize topics between two mosquitto
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'envoi des batt: Fixed a bug on sending batteries (non-static method call)
changelog.md.Amélioration de l'affichage de la fenetr: Improved display of the configuration window for transmitted equipment
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur les commandes or: Fixed bug on orphaned commands when transmitting through mqtt
changelog.md.Pour les équipements transmis sur Mqtt l: For equipment transmitted on Mqtt the plugin now sends the battery level every night
changelog.md.Le plugin pour gerer le niveau de batter: The plugin to manage the battery level transmitted between Jeedom
changelog.md.Gestion correcte des commandes de rafrai: Correct management of refresh commands on widgets on equipment transmitted between Jeedom
changelog.md.Lors de l'envoi de la découverte entre J: When sending the discovery between Jeedom the values of the commands are also transmitted (no need to wait for an update of the value to have it on the target
changelog.md.Lors la transmission d'équipement entre: When transmitting equipment between Jeedom the plugin now manages the real type of equipment to be compatible with mobile applications
changelog.md.Ajout d'une fenetre de configuration glo: Added a global configuration window for the transmission of equipment between Jeedom
changelog.md.8 ou plus possibilité de ne plus envoyer: 8 or more possibility of no longer sending all the equipment on the MQTT brocker but only certain ones (to be configured in the advanced configuration of the equipment to be transmitted
changelog.md.Discovery entre Jeedom (pour faire dialo: Discovery between Jeedom (to make 2 jeedoms communicate with each other by mqtt
changelog.md.Possibilité depuis la page de configurat: Possibility from the plugin configuration page to delete the subscription of a plugin
changelog.md.Suppression d'un check daemon launchable: Deleting a launchable daemon check (done when launching the daemon in all cases
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état du démon: Fixed a bug on the state of the daemon (started when not
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état du brocke: Fixed a bug on brocker status
changelog.md.Possibilité de corriger le QOS par defau: Possibility to correct the default QOS
changelog.md.Début d'ajout du systeme de découverte a: Start of adding the auto discovery system
changelog.md.Amélioration de la gestion de mosquitto: Improved mosquitto handling in local mode
changelog.md.Ajout d'un systeme d'autodecouverte pour: Addition of an autodiscovery system for some beta modules (esphome, tasmota and shelly
changelog.md.Ajout de l'image des modules: Added the image of the modules
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le client ID (si: Fixed a bug on the client ID (if several jeedom on the same broker
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le temps maximum: Fixed a bug on the maximum time allowed for installing dependencies
changelog.md.Ajout d'un message invitant à rétablir l: Added a message prompting to restore permissions on folders before installing Mosquitto in case of error
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton permettant de désinsta: Added a button to uninstall a local Mosquitto broker on the general plugin configuration page

index.md.permet de connecter Jeedom à un broker M: allows you to connect Jeedom to an existing MQTT broker or to install one locally or under Docker using the plugin
index.md.Ce plugin est en mesure de cumuler plusi: This plugin is able to combine several features
index.md.Servir de socle aux autres plugins pour: Serve as a base for other plugins for everything related to MQTT
index.md.Servir en mode \"standalone\" par la cré: Serve in "standalone" mode by creating action/info commands for sending/receiving messages on MQTT
index.md.Piloter Jeedom depuis un autre équipemen: Control Jeedom from another MQTT equipment
index.md.Le plugin peut aussi bien piloter des co: The plugin can both drive commands and retransmit all Jeedom events on MQTT
index.md.Après installation et activation du plug: After installing and activating the plugin, the installation of dependencies should start unless automatic management has been disabled beforehand
index.md.Dans ce cas, il faudra cliquer sur le bo: In this case, you will have to click on the button
index.md.Pour commencer la configuration du plugi: To start configuring the plugin, it is necessary to select the connection mode to the broker from the 3 possible choices
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé directe: The Mosquitto broker is installed directly on the machine that hosts Jeedom
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé et conf: The Mosquitto broker is automatically installed and configured in a Docker container using the official plugin
index.md.Dans ce mode, l'installation peut durer: In this mode, the installation can take several minutes
index.md.Dans le cas de l'utilisation d'un broker: In the case of the use of an already existing broker, it is enough to fill in its address
index.md.Une fois le broker Mosquitto installé: Once the Mosquitto broker is installed

name of the local topic often it will be "Jeedom root topic" of the remote jeedom
index.md.Dans jeedom les identifiants (`username`: In jeedom the identifiers (`username` and `password`) are available on the plugin configuration page in "Authentication" in the form `username`
index.md.Suite a une mise à jour des packages sys: Following an update of the system packages (apt) or an unattended upgrades, nothing works anymore
index.md.La mise à jour du package mosquitto reme: Updating the mosquitto package resets the service file to default and therefore mosquitto no longer points to the correct configuration file
index.md.Pour corriger cela c'est très simple il: To correct this, it's very simple, just restart the installation of mosquitto from the plugin configuration page
